pacman.model

Class MazeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.model.MazeFactory

  • public class MazeFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to construct a maze, either from local file or from a string.
    Version:
    1.0

      • readBoardFromFile

        public static Maze readBoardFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Reads from local file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The path to the file containing the maze
        Returns:
        a graph that models a social network
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file cannot be read or if file does not contain a valid formatted grid
        Effects:
        adds parsed {edge, Set-of-nodes-in-book} pairs to Map charsInBooks; adds parsed characters to Set chars

                                throws java.io.IOException
        Reads from local file.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a graph that models a social network
        Throws:
